ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the reason the test
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the reason the test was not done?

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRREASND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the data are not available may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (or example, broken equipment, subject refused, etc.) or entered as free text. When SRREASND is used, the SDTMIG variable SRSTAT should also be populated in the SDTM-based dataset.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the reason why the test or examination was not done.
